thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Student Protests

author: news24.com
title: Student Protests
text:
The current situation at campuses around the country is shocking to say the least.
The Police and Military now need to step in and take control of these above the law wannabes.
Destruction of property, closing roads breaking and entering, I mean who do these people think they are..?
 They stopping other students who want a n education from getting one, if you want to study and better your self PAY UP.
They donâ€™t want to pay they want everything for free, but when there is no electricity no lectures no books then who they going to blame NO ONE BUT THEMSELVES.
 This has gone to far and its time the law takes back what clearly these morons take for granted, they cant pay back there student loans but they have new clothes, new phones and new hair styles.
Yet they s broke, no one in the working community strikes when interest rates go up or petrol for that matter... MAYBE WE SHOULD.
Maybe we should put the entire country on hold.Serious the police need to get involved and start giving these students a lesson in LIFE, the REAL world and get them expelled or to get there lazy protesting asses back in class.You want a good job pay for the education.End of story
Hopefully the president gets law informant involved soon it needs to be done.
